Package hrps.control

Class ReservationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrps.control.ReservationController
  • public class ReservationController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a controller for reservations, includes create, update, search and remove reservations from the system.
    Author:
    Peng Wenxuan

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field Description

      Confirmed/Checked-in/Checked-out/Expired reservations data file's path.

      The static controller instance to avoid multiple instantiations.

      ArrayList of Confirmed/Checked-in/Checked-out/Expired reservations.

      Reservation Controller works closely with Room Controller.

      Waitlisted reservations data file's path.

      • getInstance

        public static ReservationController getInstance()
        Gets the controller instance. This is to avoid multiple instantiation of controller.
        Returns:

      • getReservationList

        private java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationList​(java.lang.String dir)
        Load data from the confirmed reservations data file, if the file does not exist, create and write on-memory reservations data to it.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory path.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Reservation.

      • getWaitListReservations

        private java.util.ArrayList<WaitListReservation> getWaitListReservations​(java.lang.String dir)
        Load data from the waitlisted reservations data file, if the file does not exist, create and write on-memory waitlisted reservations data to it.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory path.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of WaitListReservation.

      • createConfirmedReservation

        public ConfirmedReservation createConfirmedReservation​(Guest guest,
                                                       java.time.LocalDateTime confirmedCheckInTime,
                                                       java.time.LocalDateTime confirmedCheckOutTime,
                                                       int numOfAdult,
                                                       int numOfChild,
                                                       java.lang.String roomNum)
        Create a pending reservation and add it to the reservations' container and update the database.
        Parameters:
        guest - Guest who made the reservation.
        confirmedCheckInTime - Confirmed check-in time.
        confirmedCheckOutTime - Confirmed check-out time.
        numOfAdult - Number of adults.
        numOfChild - Number of children.
        roomNum - Room no wished to be booked.
        Returns:
        A Reservation that is in pending state and needed to be confirmed.

      • createWaitListReservation

        public WaitListReservation createWaitListReservation​(Guest guest,
                                                     java.lang.String guestContact,
                                                     java.time.LocalDateTime desiredCheckInTime,
                                                     java.time.LocalDateTime desiredCheckOutTime,
                                                     int numOfAdult,
                                                     int numOfChild,
                                                     java.lang.String roomNum)
        Create a waitlisted reservation.
        Parameters:
        guest - The guest who made the reservation.
        guestContact - Guest's contact.
        desiredCheckInTime - Desired check-in time.
        desiredCheckOutTime - Desired check-out time.
        numOfAdult - Number of adults.
        numOfChild - Number of children.
        roomNum - Room number wished to be booked.
        Returns:
        the reservation created in the waitlist

      • createWalkInReservation

        public CheckedInReservation createWalkInReservation​(Guest guest,
                                                    java.lang.String guestContact,
                                                    java.time.LocalDateTime checkInTime,
                                                    java.time.LocalDateTime expectedCheckOutTime,
                                                    int numOfAdult,
                                                    int numOfChild,
                                                    java.lang.String roomNum)
        Create a walk-in reservation which is checked-in, add it to the reservations' container and update the database.
        Parameters:
        guest - Guest who made the reservation.
        guestContact - Guest's contact.
        checkInTime - Checked-in time.
        expectedCheckOutTime - Expected check-out time.
        numOfAdult - Number of adults.
        numOfChild - Number of children.
        roomNum - Booked room no.
        Returns:
        the checked in reservation from the walk-in

      • updateContact

        public Reservation updateContact​(Reservation reservation,
                                 java.lang.String updatedContact)
        Update contact of the specified reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The specified reservation.
        updatedContact - New contact.
        Returns:
        The reservation after updated.

      • updateNumberOfGuests

        public Reservation updateNumberOfGuests​(Reservation reservation,
                                        int updatedAdult,
                                        int updatedChild)
        Update number of guests of the specified reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The specified reservation.
        updatedAdult - New number of adults.
        updatedChild - New number of children.
        Returns:
        The reservation after updated.

      • updateCheckInTime

        public Reservation updateCheckInTime​(Reservation reservation,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime updatedCheckInTime)
                              throws IllegalChangeOfDateException,
                                     InvalidDatePairException
        Update desired check-in time of the specified pending/confirmed reservation if there are valid rooms for the new check-in time, might have to change room number of this reservation if current room does not satisfied new check-in time.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The pending/confirm reservation.
        updatedCheckInTime - Newly desired check-in time.
        Returns:
        The reservation after updated.
        Throws:
        IllegalChangeOfDateException - When the specified reservation is not a pending or confirmed reservation.
        InvalidDatePairException - when the keyed in check in time is later than the expected check out time.

      • updateCheckOutTime

        public Reservation updateCheckOutTime​(Reservation reservation,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime updatedCheckOutTime)
                               throws IllegalChangeOfDateException,
                                      InvalidDatePairException
        Update desired check-out time of the specified pending/confirmed reservation if there are valid rooms for the new check-out time, might have to change room number of this reservation if current room does not satisfied new check-out time.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The pending/confirm reservation.
        updatedCheckOutTime - Newly desired check-out time.
        Returns:
        The reservation after updated.
        Throws:
        IllegalChangeOfDateException - When the specified reservation is not a pending or confirmed reservation.
        InvalidDatePairException - when the keyed in check out time is earlier than the expected check in time.

      • searchReservationsByContact

        public java.util.List<Reservation> searchReservationsByContact​(java.lang.String contact)
        Search for reservations with the specified contact number.
        Parameters:
        contact - - guest contact to find
        Returns:
        A list of reservations with the specified contact number.

      • searchReservationsByCode

        public java.util.List<Reservation> searchReservationsByCode​(java.util.UUID reservationCode)
        Search for reservations with the specified reservation code.
        Parameters:
        reservationCode - - reservation code to find
        Returns:
        A list of reservations with the specified reservation code.

      • updateReservation

        private void updateReservation​(Reservation oldReservation,
                               Reservation newReservation)
        Replace a specified reservation with another reservation in the reservations' container and update the database.
        Parameters:
        oldReservation - Reservation to be removed from the reservations' container.
        newReservation - Reservation to be added to the reservations' container.

      • confirmWaitListReservation

        public ConfirmedReservation confirmWaitListReservation​(WaitListReservation candidateReservation)
        Move a reservation from the wait list to the confirmed list and update the database.
        Parameters:
        candidateReservation - The WaitListReservation to be moved.
        Returns:
        The ConfirmedReservation.

        Search reservations in waitList corresponding to a certain room.
        Parameters:
        room - The specified room.
        Returns:
        List of reservations in waitList corresponding to a certain room.

      • getAllReservations

        public java.util.List<Reservation> getAllReservations()
        Get the non-waitlisted reservations' list.
        Returns:
        A List of all non-waitlisted reservations.

      • getAllWaitingReservations

        public java.util.List<WaitListReservation> getAllWaitingReservations()
        Get all waitlisted reservations.
        Returns:
        A List of all waitlisted reservations.

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation​(Reservation reservation)
        Remove a specified reservation from the non-waitlisted reservations' container and update the database.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The reservation to be removed.

      • deleteReservationAfterCheckingOutByRoom

        public void deleteReservationAfterCheckingOutByRoom​(Room room)
                                             throws IllegalRoomInSerializableBinaryFileException
        Throws:
        IllegalRoomInSerializableBinaryFileException

      • findCheckedInReservationByRoom

        public CheckedInReservation findCheckedInReservationByRoom​(Room room)
        Find checked-in reservation of a specified room.
        Parameters:
        room - Room to be searched.
        Returns:
        A CheckedInReservation if guests of this room have checked in, null if guests have not checked in or no reservation was made to this room.

      • findConfirmedInReservationByRoom

        public java.util.List<ConfirmedReservation> findConfirmedInReservationByRoom​(Room room)
        Find confirmed reservation of a specified room.
        Parameters:
        room - Room to be searched.
        Returns:
        A List of ConfirmedReservation whose assigned room is the specified room.

      • getValidDateTime

        private java.time.LocalDateTime getValidDateTime()
                                          throws InvalidDateTimeFormatException
        Get date-time from user's inputs in a valid format.
        Returns:
        The LocalDateTime object representing the user's inputted date-time.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateTimeFormatException - When user's input is not in format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm.

      • validateCheckIn

        public void validateCheckIn​(Reservation reservation,
                            java.time.LocalDateTime actualCheckInDateTime)
                     throws InvalidStatusChangeException
        Check if actual check in date time is 24 hours later than expected check in date time, if so, this reservation will be expired. else will perform check in for this confirmed reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservation - the reservation to check in or expire.
        actualCheckInDateTime - actual check in date time.
        Throws:
        InvalidStatusChangeException - when the checking in this reservation is not from a legal status change. (for instance, checking in a waiting reservation is not allowed)
